Class BbanImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.as.iban.impl.BbanImpl

  •  class BbanImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the basic bank account number (Bban)

    Aventum Solutions GmbH (www.aventum-solutions.de)
